Text.val: -- Created: 25.03.2008 (SCR12309, initially created by J. Paarmann 17.02.2002)
08.05.2013 SH SCR18133 ODH001F Fixed cross join error
07.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
27.03.2012 GB SCR17212 Added the DEBC_DATDELETED is null in the where clause in the ODH001F
23.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
27.11.2008 SH SCR14159 Added 3 new FCI arguments for ODC1101 (passed with 0)
01.09.2008 SH SCR13915 Replaced LimitsAndConc client fields by Limit fields
03.07.2008 GB SCR13748 Added condition If checkbox: "Only debtors with balance
on ODH001D is false then select all DEBC rows where DEBC_DATDELETED is null
20.05.2008 SH SCR12309 Added two columns to the client overview
-- No connections exists, use only current debtor heller for display/list
-- In case of connections exists, ask users which kind of connections they wants
@Program is using table MULT --> Memory database
... add always one record to MULT regarding to the commercial connection
... prepare where clauses for further selections

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,19}='','debh_datdeleted is null',Trim ({0,19})&' and debh_datdeleted is null')

Range.valUnicode: 1 Legal links,2 Commercial links 1,3 Commercial links 2

ItemsList.valUnicode: 1 Legal links,2 Commercial links 1,3 Commercial links 2,4 Active Debtor

Text.valUnicode: Only debtors with balance or limit

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Only debtors with balance or limit')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast (Sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (13,2)), cast (Sum(DEBC_FINANCELIMITH) as decimal (13,2)) FROM :2/DEBC WHERE DEBC_DEBH=:1 FOR FETCH ONLY

SELECT cast (Sum(DB.DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal (13,2)) AS ACTINVAH_SUM, cast (Sum(DB.DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)) AS ACTINVAFACACCH_SUM FROM :2/DEBC DC INNER JOIN :2/DEBB DB ON DC.DEBC_NO = DB.DEBB_DEBC_NO WHERE DC.DEBC_DEBH=:1 FOR FETCH ONLY

SELECT DC.DEBC_ADMNO, DC.DEBC_CLNTNO, cast (Sum(DC.DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (13,2)) AS CLSUM, cast (Sum(DC.DEBC_FINANCELIMITH) as decimal (13,2)) AS FLSUM, cast (Sum(DB.DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal (13,2)) AS ACTINVAH_SUM, cast (Sum(DB.DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal (13,2)) AS ACTINVAFACACCH_SUM FROM (:1/DEBH DH INNER JOIN :1/DEBC DC ON DH.DEBH_NO = DC.DEBC_DEBH) INNER JOIN :1/DEBB DB ON DC.DEBC_NO = DB.DEBB_DEBC_NO WHERE DH.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=:2 OR DH.DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1=:2 GROUP BY DC.DEBC_ADMNO, DC.DEBC_CLNTNO FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.valUnicode: List with administration connections Part I
List with administration connections Part II
List with administration connections Part III

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_CREDITLIMITH, DEBC_FINANCELIMITH, DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH FROM :1/DEBC cross join :1/DEBB :2 WHERE DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO AND DEBC_ADMNO = :3 AND DEBC_CLNTNO = :4 :5 :6 :7 AND DEBC_DATDELETED is null ORDER BY DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC FOR FETCH ONLY

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,20}='Y' AND {1,16}='N','AND (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 OR DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0)',IF ({1,20}='Y' AND {1,16}='Y','AND (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT IS NOT NULL OR DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0)',''))

IF ({1,18},'',' INNER JOIN '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBH ON DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH AND (DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&' OR DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&' OR DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH2 = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&')')

Text.val: selected debtor heller does not exist

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_NO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBC_FINANCELIMITH, DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH FROM :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB :2 WHERE DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO AND DEBC_ADMNO = :3 AND DEBC_CLNTNO = :4 :5 :6 :7 ORDER BY DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_DEBC FOR FETCH ONLY

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({1,20}='Y' AND {1,16}='N','AND (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 OR DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0)',IF ({1,20}='Y' AND {1,16}='Y','AND (DEBC_CREDITLIMIT IS NOT NULL OR DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0)',''))

IF ({1,18},'',' INNER JOIN '&Trim (INIGet ('[MAGIC_LOGICAL_NAMES]FACTORLINKLIB'))&'/DEBH ON DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH AND (DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&' OR DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH1 = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&' OR DEBH_COMMERCIALOWNER_DEBH2 = '&Trim (Str ({1,21},'9'))&')')

Text.val: selected debtor heller does not exist
set a temporary instance for activation
set instance back to actual value for the selected debtor
